typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTableName as string (""),
	TargetTableName as string ("")
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat("raw/json/",$SourceTableName,".json"))]) ~> JsonRaw
JsonRaw derive(DateInserted = currentTimestamp()) ~> MetadataColumns
MetadataColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: (concat("delta/bronze/",$TargetTableName,"/")),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Delta

parameters{
	SourceTableName as string (""),
	TargetTableName as string ("")
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat("raw/parquet/",$SourceTableName,".parquet"))]) ~> ParquetRaw
ParquetRaw derive(DateInserted = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: (concat("delta/bronze/",$TargetTableName,"/")),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Delta

source: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS bronze LOCATION "/delta/bronze/"

%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "synstg"
blob_container_name = "syn-fs"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("AzureBlobStorage1")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://syn-fs@synstg.blob.core.windows.net/delta/bronze/Address/*.parquet', format='parquet')
display(df.limit(10))

%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "synstg"
blob_container_name = "syn-fs"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("AzureBlobStorage1")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://syn-fs@synstg.blob.core.windows.net/delta/bronze/Address/part-00000-9b01d580-033d-4624-973a-c484167535a3-c000.snappy.parquet', format='parquet')
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("default.YourTableName")

df = spark.read.load('wasbs://syn-fs@synstg.blob.core.windows.net/delta/bronze/Address/part-00000-9b01d580-033d-4624-973a-c484167535a3-c000.snappy.parquet', format='parquet')
